interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Biutee Starry Sky Nail Gel Firework Nail Gel With black Nail Polish Gel 8ml UV LED Review Date: 2020/09/19 Store: Biutee Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Biutee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '3.5274 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 3.31 x 1.77 inches; 4.59 Ounces'} Review Text: Thank you in advance to the Amazon VINE program for providing an item to review. A positive review was not required, nor was it requested, and all words are my own.

Getting my nails done is not just a relaxing experience, but it is also an expressive/creative one.

Seeing this colorful and glittery set – I had to get it.

I don’t know about others’ experiences – mine did not come with a brush or applicator for the little “gel pots”. I remembered what my nail techs used to use – small make-up brushes – and thankfully I had some. That seemed to work.

The black polish is necessary to get the desired effect. I chose the purple glitter gel and after a few awkward moments – I got a pretty decent manicure. More of the black showed through, there were moments when the purple glitter reflected, but it wasn’t what I thought.

I haven’t tried the other colors. But, this is fairly decent and easy to use. Not my favorite as there are other brands out there that are even easier to use.

Overall, I’m not too unhappy with it. It’s not something I would likely purchase again. Review Title: Not so Starry Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest**: Engages with nail care products, particularly gel polishes.
- **Aesthetic Preference**: Favors colorful and glittery designs for nail art, indicating a taste for expressive and creative styles.
- **User Experience Emphasis**: Enjoys the relaxing and artistic nature of manicures but values practical usability in products.
- **Critical Evaluation**: Shows a tendency to share candid feedback, appreciating aspects of a product while also pointing out limitations.
- **Learning Curve**: Demonstrates adaptability, using alternative tools when necessary (e.g., makeup brushes) for application.
- **Comparative Mindset**: Open to comparing products and brands, indicating that she may seek out alternatives that offer ease of use and better results.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: Expresses moderate satisfaction with the product, not favoring it enough to repurchase, suggesting a preference for higher-quality alternatives.

**Conclusion**: This user seeks nail products that combine creativity with usability and expresses a practical approach to product evaluations.
